attributes.review:
Where do I even begin? 
1)Black Lives Matter
2)We can’t allow Trump to defund schools
3)Trump won’t force you to wear a mask when out in public because he doesn’t care about humanity
4)He wants to ban TikTok from America to punish China? I literally can’t......I just can’t 

The list goes on and on and on..............

Also, I don’t understand how this app currently has 1.2 stars when literally everyone has given a 1 star rating??????? 

Apple needs to remove this app!
attributes.title: America is better off without Trump
Worst app I have ever seen

attributes.review: imagine voting for a white supremacist
attributes.title: gross

attributes.review: 🎵You think I'm an ignorant savage and you’ve been so many places I guess it must be so, but still I cannot see if the savage one is me. How can there be so much that you don’t know? You don’t know! You think the only people who are people are the people who look and think like you, but if you walked the footsteps of a stranger you’ll learn things you never knew you never knew. For whether we are white or copper skinned. We need to sing with all the voices of the mountains! We need to paint with all the colors of the wind! You can own the earth and still all you’ll own is earth until you can paint with all the colors of the wind!🎵
attributes.title: Colors of the Wind

attributes.review: Ugh this app is horrible as soon as I tried to go on the app crashed.Totally unworth the hype .Gosh please fix this app.If the app has continuous bugs that aren’t fixed maybe it shouldn’t be on the App Store.🧚🏾❤️
attributes.title: Horrible✨🧚🏾

attributes.review: Want to be lied to? Want to be given false facts? Want to be oppressed and denied basic human right? Well this is the app for you! While you sit here on this app forget about the thousands of kids and people being treated like animals and being put in cages with no basic human decency like food and water. You can also forget about the world wide pandemic going on and how our genius president pulled the US out of the WHO in the middle of it. But wait! There’s more! You can also forget about the fact that people are being slaughtered because of the color of their skin. This app is garbage and so is Trump. 🧚‍♀️💕
attributes.title: App full of lies and hate

attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what all the fuss was about and little did i know what was in store for me. upon opening the app i was greeted with a quite frankly disturbing photo. it was an old man, and i’m not sure what is wrong with him, but he looked like a deflated basketball or a rotting peach! i have no clue why he looks like that but i don’t think that is what people should see when first opening the app. also, this man was standing in front of the american flag holding up a fist. you might think there is nothing wrong with that but the look on his face was very sad. i think this must have been because there was something reflective behind the camera and he saw himself. in this photo his expression should be happy and proud but it was the exact opposite.
attributes.title: ZERO STARS

attributes.review: Do NOT download this app it’s one of the worst things I have downloaded on my phone. Not only it took SO long to download , but it wasted so much time out of my day!!! PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: 🤮‼️Absolute garbage‼️🤮

attributes.review: I mean, do I even need an explanation?
This made my dogs uterus fall out 😡🤬😿
attributes.title: No❤️
